title: Trump Plans to Sue the BBC
summary: Donald Trump, who was the president of the United States, says he will take the BBC to court. He is angry because the BBC changed a video of a speech he gave in 2021. Trump wants the BBC to pay him a lot of money, at least one billion dollars, for this mistake. The BBC is a big news company from the United Kingdom. This situation shows that famous people sometimes use lawyers to solve problems with the media. It is important to check facts and be fair when reporting news.

background_read: Donald Trump was the president of the United States from 2017 to 2021. He is known for being a businessman and a TV star before politics. The BBC is a famous news organization in the UK that reports on events worldwide. Sometimes, news companies make mistakes in their reports, and people can sue them if they feel harmed. This article talks about a legal dispute over a changed video, which is important for understanding how media and laws work together.
